name: ros2-humble-env (Codespaces)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; for shellrc in ~/.bashrc ~/.zshrc; do if [ -f \"$shellrc\" ]; then grep -qxF 'export TMPDIR=/tmp' \"$shellrc\" || echo 'export TMPDIR=/tmp' >> \"$shellrc\"; grep -qxF '. /nix/var/nix/profiles/default/etc/profile.d/nix.sh' \"$shellrc\" || echo '. /nix/var/nix/profiles/default/etc/profile.d/nix.sh' >> \"$shellrc\"; fi; done; export TMPDIR=/tmp; if command -v nix >/dev/null 2>&1; then nix --version; nix profile install github:nixos/nixpkgs/nixos-unstable#direnv github:nixos/nixpkgs/nixos-unstable#nix-direnv github:nixos/nixpkgs/nixos-unstable#nil github:nixos/nixpkgs/nixos-unstable#nixfmt-rfc-style github:nixos/nixpkgs/nixos-unstable#nix-output-monitor 2>/dev/null || true; fi; echo \"Devcontainer ready. Run: nix develop\""
